keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the Petroleum Facilities Guards said at least nine guards and 30 militants had been killed.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Libya: Oil Storage Tanks Burn After ISIS Attacks Ports
headline.main: Libya: Oil Storage Tanks Burn After ISIS Attacks Ports

snippet: A spokesman for the Petroleum Facilities Guards said at least nine guards and 30 militants had been killed.
abstract: Libya officials say attacks by Islamic State militants on country's largest oil ports have started fires that have spread to five oil storage tanks.
